message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $2000000. I believe it's a great deal for you, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to your business. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your confidence in the value of your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $2000000 price point. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1500000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
